original_text: And at even, when the sun did set, they brought unto him all that were diseased, and them that were possessed with devils.
korean_text: 저물어 해 질 때에 모든 병자와 귀신 들린 자를 예수께 데려오니

sentences.original_text: they brought unto him all that were diseased
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그에게 모든 병든 자들을 데려왔고

sentences.original_text: and them that were possessed with devils
